narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
The following non compliant items were corrected from the last inspection dated 7/23/2015:
-- 2.40(b)(2) The two female Pugs (Rosebud #210 and Chip#Homeagain 0A02005516) have been seen by the
attending veterinarian and the foot issues have been addressed and corrected.
-- 3.11(d) The 3 Sheba Inus in the outdoor portion had been treated for their heavy tick infestation.
 
Exit interview conducted with Brittany Light, ACI and facility representative.
